quizzes.question:
The simplest among the various 
texturing methods is not image texturing.

A texture is typically represented 
as a 2D array of texels texture elements.

A texels location can not be 
described by the coordinates of its center.

Image texturing is often described as 
pasting an image on an objects surface.

The most popular lighting method is 
not based on the Phong model.

The Phong model is composed of four terms: 
 diffuse, specular, ambient and emissive.

The diffuse term is 
not based on Lamberts law.

Lambertian surfaces are not scattered
 with equal intensity in all directions.

The amount of perceived reflection is
 not independent of the view direction

The fragment shader has not processed
 the fragments in the viewport.

Color buffer is not a memory space storing
 the pixels to be displayed on the screen.

If the fragment has a smaller zvalue,
 its color and zvalue are used to
 update the color buffer and zbuffer
